entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
